title: A Wrong Number Made My Day
sub_head: I don’t want to buy an Aston Martin, but I enjoy being reminded of James Bond.
body:
You might not think that someone calling a wrong number could light up your day.
I was walking down the street when the phone in my pocket rang.
“Hi,” a man’s voice said. “I’m returning your call about wanting to buy a Vanquish.”
“A Vanquish?” I said. “What’s a Vanquish?”
There was a pause. “An Aston Martin Vanquish,” the man said.
